story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_0100:
Are you all rested enough? If so, time for us to
head out after Giovanni and the others!
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_0200:
Yup! I’m ready to go! I won’t let those villains get
away with their nasty plans!
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_0401_0400: That’s the spirit. We’re counting on you.
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_0302_0500: I’m a little scared, but let’s do it!
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_0402_0600: Don’t worry. We’ll be with you.
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_0900: Huh? Oh, I’m OK. It’s just...
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_1000: Your...outfits! Those sygna suits are really cool.
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_1200:
Isn’t it great? It lives up to my nickname, the
Tomboyish Mermaid!
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_1300:
I don’t usually wear this style of clothing...but I
do think it’s cute!
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_1400:
And when I wear it, I feel even closer to Leafeon!
It’s great for when we need to be in sync.
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_1500: Yes! Your outfits match your partners so well!
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_1600:
It’s kinda funny that you’re thinking about our
outfits right before a big showdown!
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_1700:
Maybe it’s a good thing. Releasing nervous
tension before a battle can actually work to
your advantage.
story_teamrocket_01_17000/2401_1201_1800:
Yeah, I guess so. Anyways, it’s about time we hit
the road!
